caption.p: Essential oils sensorial description. Artemisia verlotiorum, Lavandula dentata, and Ruta chalepensis main essential oils (EOs) sensorial descriptors ranked by panel components on a 0-to-10 scale. Histograms represent the mean of the ranks; different letters indicate significant differences (Tukey’s b, P ≤ 0.05) for each descriptor among EOs; bars represent the confidence interval.
